/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
